mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS id, user_name AS name, grade_name AS grade, user_point AS point, COALESCE(PROFILE_IMG, 'https://image.oliveyoung.co.kr/uploads/images/mbrProfile/2023/11/06/1699251894483.png') AS img, COALESCE(TOTOAL_DEPOSIT, 0) AS deposit, COUNT(coupon_id) AS coupon FROM olive_user u LEFT JOIN olive_members m ON u.grade_id = m.grade_id LEFT JOIN userprofile up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN user_deposit d ON u.user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN user_coupon c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{ userid } GROUP BY u.user_id, user_name, grade_name, user_point, PROFILE_IMG, TOTOAL_DEPOSIT
